title: How long do I have to wait on my phone?
content:
7 weeks and counting and still haven't received my phone back from Google after a repair, I'm getting what looks like automated responses from different team members. "I'd like to inform you that our specialist is already on this issue. I'd request you to please wait till we receive any update from them. Once I receive any update, I'll get back to you via email within 24 hours."

Anyone else dealing with a similar problem?
